channel.title: If someone helps me make a quest {surprise :O} simple fast easy quest!
channel.description: ok i want a npc the lumbridge guide to be the npc you talk to for the whole quest. and when someone talks to him i want there to be options and the question. if they get the question wrong they got to start the quest all over again and if they get the 1-10 questions correctly they get modship. how can i do this?anyone :S

item.title: If someone helps me make a quest {surprise :O} simple fast easy quest!
item.dc:creator: @I_pwnd_you_all I pwnd you all
item.description:
@I_pwnd_you_all wrote:

No clue on how this is done, but I can guess…
sendFrame164(interfaceID)
sendQuest(“Quest”, line#);
sendQuest(“Answer”, line#);
sendQuest(“Answer”, line#);

Take it like a menu…

Read full topic
item.source: If someone helps me make a quest {surprise :O} simple fast easy quest!

item.title: If someone helps me make a quest {surprise :O} simple fast easy quest!
item.dc:creator: @montalvom montalvom
item.description:
@montalvom wrote:

I pwnd you all:

You need to learn how to sendFrame164 with some text in it. The rest is easy.

where can i get this? or were can i learn?

Read full topic
